name: Color Heroes: The Cube War
description:
Discover your inner warrior, a fearless conqueror and adventurer! Become a sneaky Ninja, a fearless Indian or a powerful Viking! Practise your skills every day, crush and punch enemy cubes to become a true master of warcraft.

How to become a Color Hero today?
Score points by making a color match between cubes.
Stakes gets higher if you punch a few cubes in one move.
Use the gathered points to develop your warrior and his fort.
Present your highscores to the world and compete with other players on a score ladder.
Build your legend!

Battle your way through countless cube enemies and crush them with your hero’s powerful punch. Practise your reflexes, and tactic skills build your focus and learn to make quick decisions. Focus, match cubes and become a Color Hero! With Color Heroes you will not want to stop.

Questions or comments? Feel free to contact us!
galantegames.com
